message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $110 is a bit too steep for me. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $100.
